pokecraft.species.bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
pokecraft.species.bulbasaur.desc: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.
pokecraft.species.ivysaur.name: Ivysaur
pokecraft.species.ivysaur.desc: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
pokecraft.species.venusaur.name: Venusaur
pokecraft.species.venusaur.desc: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.
pokecraft.species.charmander.name: Charmander
pokecraft.species.charmander.desc: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
pokecraft.species.charmeleon.name: Charmeleon
pokecraft.species.charmeleon.desc: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
pokecraft.species.charizard.name: Charizard
pokecraft.species.charizard.desc: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.
pokecraft.species.squirtle.name: Squirtle
pokecraft.species.squirtle.desc: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.
pokecraft.species.wartortle.name: Wartortle
pokecraft.species.wartortle.desc: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
pokecraft.species.blastoise.name: Blastoise
pokecraft.species.blastoise.desc: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
pokecraft.species.caterpie.name: Caterpie
pokecraft.species.caterpie.desc: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokecraft.species.metapod.name: Metapod
pokecraft.species.metapod.desc: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a harsh attack.
pokecraft.species.butterfree.name: Butterfree
pokecraft.species.butterfree.desc: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
pokecraft.species.weedle.name: Weedle
pokecraft.species.weedle.desc: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.
pokecraft.species.kakuna.name: Kakuna
pokecraft.species.kakuna.desc: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
pokecraft.species.beedrill.name: Beedrill
pokecraft.species.beedrill.desc: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
pokecraft.species.pidgey.name: Pidgey
pokecraft.species.pidgey.desc: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.
pokecraft.species.pidgeotto.name: Pidgeotto
pokecraft.species.pidgeotto.desc: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.
pokecraft.species.pidgeot.name: Pidgeot
pokecraft.species.pidgeot.desc: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.
pokecraft.species.rattata.name: Rattata
pokecraft.species.rattata.desc: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.
pokecraft.species.raticate.name: Raticate
pokecraft.species.raticate.desc: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.
pokecraft.species.spearow.name: Spearow
pokecraft.species.spearow.desc: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.
pokecraft.species.fearow.name: Fearow
pokecraft.species.fearow.desc: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
pokecraft.species.ekans.name: Ekans
pokecraft.species.ekans.desc: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
pokecraft.species.arbok.name: Arbok
pokecraft.species.arbok.desc: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
pokecraft.species.pikachu.name: Pikachu
pokecraft.species.pikachu.desc: Possesses cheek sacs in which it stores electricity. This clever forest-dweller roasts tough berries with an electric shock before consuming them.
pokecraft.species.raichu.name: Raichu
pokecraft.species.raichu.desc: It can discharge bursts of electricity exceeding 100,000 volts— a single strike with that amount of power would incapacitate one of the Copperajah of my homeland.
pokecraft.species.sandshrew.name: Sandshrew
pokecraft.species.sandshrew.desc: It burrows into the ground to create its nest. If hard stones impede its tunneling, it uses its sharp claws to shatter them and then carries on digging.
pokecraft.species.sandslash.name: Sandslash
pokecraft.species.sandslash.desc: It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.
pokecraft.species.nidoranf.name: Nidoran♀
pokecraft.species.nidoranf.desc: It uses its hard incisor teeth to crush and eat berries. The tip of a female Nidoran’s horn is a bit more rounded than the tip of a male’s horn.
pokecraft.species.nidorina.name: Nidorina
pokecraft.species.nidorina.desc: If the group is threatened, these Pokémon will band together to assault enemies with a chorus of ultrasonic waves.
pokecraft.species.nidoqueen.name: Nidoqueen
pokecraft.species.nidoqueen.desc: It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.
pokecraft.species.nidoranm.name: Nidoran♂
pokecraft.species.nidoranm.desc: Small but brave, this Pokémon will hold its ground and even risk its life in battle to protect the female it’s friendly with.
pokecraft.species.nidorino.name: Nidorino
pokecraft.species.nidorino.desc: It’s nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.
pokecraft.species.nidoking.name: Nidoking
pokecraft.species.nidoking.desc: Nidoking prides itself on its strength. It’s forceful and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail and diamond-crushing horn.
pokecraft.species.clefairy.name: Clefairy
pokecraft.species.clefairy.desc: It can be found in quiet mountain areas on a full moon's night. Its dancing and its tiny, faintly glowing wings confer upon it a lovely fairylike quality.
pokecraft.species.clefable.name: Clefable
pokecraft.species.clefable.desc: Legend says that on clear, quiet nights, it listens for the voices of its kin living on the moon. I, too, often think of my homeland, so far away.
pokecraft.species.vulpix.name: Vulpix
pokecraft.species.vulpix.desc: In its belly burns a fire, which Vulpix spits out in the form of fireballs. When young, this Pokémon has but one white tail. As the Pokémon matures, this single tail splits into six.
pokecraft.species.ninetales.name: Ninetales
pokecraft.species.ninetales.desc: The coat of gleaming golden fur is quite magnificent. This species is said to store sacred power in its nine long tails and to live for a millennium.
pokecraft.species.jigglypuff.name: Jigglypuff
pokecraft.species.jigglypuff.desc: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.
pokecraft.species.wigglytuff.name: Wigglytuff
pokecraft.species.wigglytuff.desc: It’s proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate. In particular, the curl on its forehead has a texture that’s perfectly heavenly.
pokecraft.species.zubat.name: Zubat
pokecraft.species.zubat.desc: Makes its home in gloomy caves. Atrophied eyes have left this Pokémon blind, so it scans its surroundings via sound waves that it emits from its mouth as it flies.
pokecraft.species.golbat.name: Golbat
pokecraft.species.golbat.desc: It sinks its sharp fangs into other creatures and slurps up their blood. A closer look at the fangs reveals that they are hollow and akin to straws.
pokecraft.species.oddish.name: Oddish
pokecraft.species.oddish.desc: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
pokecraft.species.gloom.name: Gloom
pokecraft.species.gloom.desc: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.
pokecraft.species.vileplume.name: Vileplume
pokecraft.species.vileplume.desc: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
pokecraft.species.paras.name: Paras
pokecraft.species.paras.desc: Sometimes seen at the foot of trees in humid forests. The mushrooms on its back—called tochukaso—are not present on infant specimens and instead emerge as Paras matures.
pokecraft.species.parasect.name: Parasect
pokecraft.species.parasect.desc: Mushroom-lacking specimens of this Pokémon lie unmoving in the forest, lending credence to the hypothesis that the large mushroom is in control of Parasect's actions.
pokecraft.species.venonat.name: Venonat
pokecraft.species.venonat.desc: Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.
pokecraft.species.venomoth.name: Venomoth
pokecraft.species.venomoth.desc: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.
pokecraft.species.diglett.name: Diglett
pokecraft.species.diglett.desc: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.
pokecraft.species.dugtrio.name: Dugtrio
pokecraft.species.dugtrio.desc: These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it’s like underground.
pokecraft.species.meowth.name: Meowth
pokecraft.species.meowth.desc: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.
pokecraft.species.persian.name: Persian
pokecraft.species.persian.desc: Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship between the two is one of mutual disdain.
pokecraft.species.psyduck.name: Psyduck
pokecraft.species.psyduck.desc: Suffers perpetual headaches. If the agony grows too great, Psyduck's latent power erupts, contrary to Psyduck's intent. Ergo, I am exploring ways to ease the pain.
pokecraft.species.golduck.name: Golduck
pokecraft.species.golduck.desc: Its body is strong, and it has webbing on its hands and feet. Golduck can swim easily through rough seas, clawing its way through the high waves.
pokecraft.species.mankey.name: Mankey
pokecraft.species.mankey.desc: An agile Pokémon that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.
pokecraft.species.primeape.name: Primeape
pokecraft.species.primeape.desc: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.
pokecraft.species.growlithe.name: Growlithe
pokecraft.species.growlithe.desc: They patrol their territory in pairs. I believe the igneous rock components in the fur of this species are the result of volcanic activity in its habitat.
pokecraft.species.arcanine.name: Arcanine
pokecraft.species.arcanine.desc: Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a deceptively merry chase as it all but dances around them.
pokecraft.species.poliwag.name: Poliwag
pokecraft.species.poliwag.desc: In rivers with fast-flowing water, this Pokémon will cling to a rock by using its thick lips, which act like a suction cup.
pokecraft.species.poliwhirl.name: Poliwhirl
pokecraft.species.poliwhirl.desc: This Pokémon’s sweat is a slimy mucus. When captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies’ grasp and escape.
pokecraft.species.poliwrath.name: Poliwrath
pokecraft.species.poliwrath.desc: Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out powerful punches.
pokecraft.species.abra.name: Abra
pokecraft.species.abra.desc: Spends 18 hours of the day sleeping. Even while asleep, Abra can control its psychic powers—should danger approach, the Pokémon will simply teleport away.
pokecraft.species.kadabra.name: Kadabra
pokecraft.species.kadabra.desc: There are rumors that a child with mystical powers became a Kadabra; however, this remains unverified. I suspect that the spoon Kadabra holds enhances its brain waves.
pokecraft.species.alakazam.name: Alakazam
pokecraft.species.alakazam.desc: The longer Alakazam lives, the larger and heavier its head becomes. Our tests have shown that the strength of its psychic powers correlates positively to the weight of its head.
pokecraft.species.machop.name: Machop
pokecraft.species.machop.desc: Though as small as a child, it has strength enough to easily throw a well-built adult. Striving to become ever stronger, Machop trains by carrying a Graveler on its shoulders.
pokecraft.species.machoke.name: Machoke
pokecraft.species.machoke.desc: A sturdy creature boasting a robust physique and boundless stamina. Loves training above all else and voluntarily assists with tasks such as construction and clearing land.
pokecraft.species.machamp.name: Machamp
pokecraft.species.machamp.desc: In close combat, its four arms afford it offensive and defensive supremacy. In but a blink, this valiant Pokémon can overwhelm its foes with more than 1,000 blows from its fists.
pokecraft.species.bellsprout.name: Bellsprout
pokecraft.species.bellsprout.desc: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.
pokecraft.species.weepinbell.name: Weepinbell
pokecraft.species.weepinbell.desc: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.
pokecraft.species.victreebel.name: Victreebel
pokecraft.species.victreebel.desc: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.
pokecraft.species.tentacool.name: Tentacool
pokecraft.species.tentacool.desc: They fire beams from the glassy, magenta orbs that resemble eyes atop their heads, and they drift in shallow seas. During low tide, they can sometimes be found on beaches, desiccated.
pokecraft.species.tentacruel.name: Tentacruel
pokecraft.species.tentacruel.desc: It has 80 tentacles, each with a venomous tip. These tentacles are also extendible, lengthening when Tentacruel attempts to catch prey. Use caution.
pokecraft.species.geodude.name: Geodude
pokecraft.species.geodude.desc: Makes its home in mountainous regions, using its arms to climb along harsh mountain roads. Can be troublesome—carelessly kicking one will cause it to fly into a rage and chase after you.
pokecraft.species.graveler.name: Graveler
pokecraft.species.graveler.desc: Dwells in holes dug into sheer walls of stone. It enjoys rolling down slopes as though it were a boulder during a rockfall, so keep an eye upward while traversing mountain roads.
pokecraft.species.golem.name: Golem
pokecraft.species.golem.desc: The rocklike shell is shed each year. The cast-off shell then crumbles, reverting to a mass of soil, which can be spread across fields to promote crop growth.
pokecraft.species.ponyta.name: Ponyta
pokecraft.species.ponyta.desc: These Pokémon live in herds out in the grassland. Newborn foals lack their fiery manes, which will develop about an hour after birth.
pokecraft.species.rapidash.name: Rapidash
pokecraft.species.rapidash.desc: Fiery mane aglow, Rapidash darts like an arrow across the land. This prodigiously swift creature can traverse the vast region of Hisui in a day and a half.
pokecraft.species.slowpoke.name: Slowpoke
pokecraft.species.slowpoke.desc: When this Pokémon’s tail is soaked in water, sweetness seeps from it. Slowpoke uses this trait to lure in and fish up other Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.slowbro.name: Slowbro
pokecraft.species.slowbro.desc: Being bitten by a Shellder shocked this Pokémon into standing on two legs. If the Shellder lets go, it seems Slowbro will turn back into a Slowpoke.
pokecraft.species.magnemite.name: Magnemite
pokecraft.species.magnemite.desc: A bizarre Pokémon with but a single eye embedded in an iron sphere. I suspect this creature levitates due to the magnetism it emits from its arms, which resemble horseshoe-shaped magnets.
pokecraft.species.magneton.name: Magneton
pokecraft.species.magneton.desc: Three Magnemite gathered to evolve into this Pokémon. The source of much vexation on my part, as its powerful magnetism destroys my research equipment.
pokecraft.species.farfetchd.name: Farfetch’d
pokecraft.species.farfetchd.desc: They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all of them use it in the same way. Several distinct styles of stalk fighting have been observed.
pokecraft.species.doduo.name: Doduo
pokecraft.species.doduo.desc: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.
pokecraft.species.dodrio.name: Dodrio
pokecraft.species.dodrio.desc: One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.
pokecraft.species.seel.name: Seel
pokecraft.species.seel.desc: Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokecraft.species.dewgong.name: Dewgong
pokecraft.species.dewgong.desc: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.
pokecraft.species.grimer.name: Grimer
pokecraft.species.grimer.desc: Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.
pokecraft.species.muk.name: Muk
pokecraft.species.muk.desc: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.
pokecraft.species.shellder.name: Shellder
pokecraft.species.shellder.desc: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
pokecraft.species.cloyster.name: Cloyster
pokecraft.species.cloyster.desc: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.
pokecraft.species.gastly.name: Gastly
pokecraft.species.gastly.desc: Gaseous and completely impalpable. Also highly dangerous— inhaling part of its poisonous body will cause one to faint instantly.
pokecraft.species.haunter.name: Haunter
pokecraft.species.haunter.desc: This frightful, malevolent spirit can glide through walls, appearing wherever it likes. According to rumor, victims of a Haunter's lick will wither to death day by day.
pokecraft.species.gengar.name: Gengar
pokecraft.species.gengar.desc: Possesses potential victims' shadows in an effort to steal away the victims' lives. If your shadow begins to laugh, you must take hold of a protective charm posthaste!
pokecraft.species.onix.name: Onix
pokecraft.species.onix.desc: This chain of immense stones resembles a giant serpent. Tremors shake the earth above as it burrows deep beneath the ground, feeding on boulders as it goes.
pokecraft.species.drowzee.name: Drowzee
pokecraft.species.drowzee.desc: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it had eaten in the past.
pokecraft.species.hypno.name: Hypno
pokecraft.species.hypno.desc: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
pokecraft.species.krabby.name: Krabby
pokecraft.species.krabby.desc: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.
pokecraft.species.kingler.name: Kingler
pokecraft.species.kingler.desc: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it’s not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.
pokecraft.species.voltorb.name: Voltorb
pokecraft.species.voltorb.desc: An enigmatic Pokémon that happens to bear a resemblance to a Poké Ball. When excited, it discharges the electric current it has stored in its belly, then lets out a great, uproarious laugh.
pokecraft.species.electrode.name: Electrode
pokecraft.species.electrode.desc: The tissue on the surface of its body is curiously similar in composition to an Apricorn. When irritated, this Pokémon lets loose an electric current equal to 20 lightning bolts.
pokecraft.species.exeggcute.name: Exeggcute
pokecraft.species.exeggcute.desc: These Pokémon get nervous when they’re not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.
pokecraft.species.exeggutor.name: Exeggutor
pokecraft.species.exeggutor.desc: When they work together, Exeggutor’s three heads can put out powerful psychic energy. Cloudy days make this Pokémon sluggish.
pokecraft.species.cubone.name: Cubone
pokecraft.species.cubone.desc: This Pokémon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubone’s dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.
pokecraft.species.marowak.name: Marowak
pokecraft.species.marowak.desc: When this Pokémon evolved, the skull of its mother fused to it. Marowak’s temperament also turned vicious at the same time.
pokecraft.species.hitmonlee.name: Hitmonlee
pokecraft.species.hitmonlee.desc: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
pokecraft.species.hitmonchan.name: Hitmonchan
pokecraft.species.hitmonchan.desc: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
pokecraft.species.lickitung.name: Lickitung
pokecraft.species.lickitung.desc: Wields its long tongue deftly, as though it were an arm. The Pokémon's viscous saliva, once it has been collected and boiled down, yields a strong and highly useful adhesive.
pokecraft.species.koffing.name: Koffing
pokecraft.species.koffing.desc: It adores polluted air. Some claim that Koffing used to be more plentiful in the Galar region than they are now.
pokecraft.species.weezing.name: Weezing
pokecraft.species.weezing.desc: It can’t suck in air quite as well as a Galarian Weezing, but the toxins it creates are more potent than those of its counterpart.
pokecraft.species.rhyhorn.name: Rhyhorn
pokecraft.species.rhyhorn.desc: Ludicrously strong—when it butts heads with a mountain, it is the mountain that shatters. But its short legs struggle with turns, and it is incapable of stopping unless it collides with something.
pokecraft.species.rhydon.name: Rhydon
pokecraft.species.rhydon.desc: Rapidly rotates its horn to bore through bedrock. It swaggers around volcanic regions, protected from the lava's heat by its tough, armorlike hide.
pokecraft.species.chansey.name: Chansey
pokecraft.species.chansey.desc: This purehearted Pokémon shares its eggs with the injured.
pokecraft.species.tangela.name: Tangela
pokecraft.species.tangela.desc: It is cloaked entirely in blue vines, preventing any glimpse of its true identity. The vines impart a refreshing sensation when chewed—they're useful as a spice.
pokecraft.species.kangaskhan.name: Kangaskhan
pokecraft.species.kangaskhan.desc: There are records of a lost human child being raised by a childless Kangaskhan.
pokecraft.species.horsea.name: Horsea
pokecraft.species.horsea.desc: They swim with dance-like motions and cause whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.
pokecraft.species.seadra.name: Seadra
pokecraft.species.seadra.desc: Seadra’s mouth is slender, but its suction power is strong. In an instant, Seadra can suck in food that’s larger than the opening of its mouth.
pokecraft.species.goldeen.name: Goldeen
pokecraft.species.goldeen.desc: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.
pokecraft.species.seaking.name: Seaking
pokecraft.species.seaking.desc: Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.
pokecraft.species.staryu.name: Staryu
pokecraft.species.staryu.desc: Fish Pokémon nibble at it, but Staryu isn’t bothered. Its body regenerates quickly, even if part of it is completely torn off.
pokecraft.species.starmie.name: Starmie
pokecraft.species.starmie.desc: Starmie swims by spinning its body at high speed. As this Pokémon cruises through the ocean, it absorbs tiny plankton.
pokecraft.species.mrmime.name: Mr. Mime
pokecraft.species.mrmime.desc: The behavior of this clown-like Pokémon reminds one of pantomime. It creates invisible walls using a force emitted from its fingertips.
pokecraft.species.scyther.name: Scyther
pokecraft.species.scyther.desc: The large, wickedly sharp scythes on its forearms are truly fearsome weapons. Prey's attempts to flee are unfailingly thwarted by this Pokémon's nimble motions.
pokecraft.species.jynx.name: Jynx
pokecraft.species.jynx.desc: The Jynx of Galar often have beautiful and delicate voices. Some of these Pokémon have even gathered a fan base.
pokecraft.species.electabuzz.name: Electabuzz
pokecraft.species.electabuzz.desc: Feeds on electrical energy. During sudden showers beneath looming thunderclouds, one can observe Electabuzz scaling tall trees, where the Pokémon will then wait for lightning to strike.
pokecraft.species.magmar.name: Magmar
pokecraft.species.magmar.desc: Legend has it that this Pokémon was born from the crater of a volcano. When wounded, it bathes in lava to heal its body, much as one would soak in a hot spring.
pokecraft.species.pinsir.name: Pinsir
pokecraft.species.pinsir.desc: This Pokémon clamps its pincers down on its prey and then either splits the prey in half or flings it away.
pokecraft.species.tauros.name: Tauros
pokecraft.species.tauros.desc: The Tauros of the Galar region are volatile in nature, and they won’t allow people to ride on their backs.
pokecraft.species.magikarp.name: Magikarp
pokecraft.species.magikarp.desc: A feeble, pitiful imbecile of a Pokémon that is nonetheless very hardy. Unperturbed by turbid water, it can be found living in all sorts of places.
pokecraft.species.gyarados.name: Gyarados
pokecraft.species.gyarados.desc: I suspect this Pokémon to be the true identity of a dragon written of in ancient texts, which claimed that it razed an entire village with white-hot beams from its maw.
pokecraft.species.lapras.name: Lapras
pokecraft.species.lapras.desc: Crossing icy seas is no issue for this cold-resistant Pokémon. Its smooth skin is a little cool to the touch.
pokecraft.species.ditto.name: Ditto
pokecraft.species.ditto.desc: When it encounters another Ditto, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.
pokecraft.species.eevee.name: Eevee
pokecraft.species.eevee.desc: Harbors the potential to evolve into manifold forms. Within Eevee lies the key to the mysteries of Pokémon evolution—I'm certain of it.
pokecraft.species.vaporeon.name: Vaporeon
pokecraft.species.vaporeon.desc: Tests show that its cells closely resemble water molecules, which perhaps explains its ability to conceal its form while submerged. I believe the origins of mermaid folklore lie with this Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.jolteon.name: Jolteon
pokecraft.species.jolteon.desc: Bristles its fur into sharp, needlelike points when enraged. One can hear electricity crackle in its breath when it exhales.
pokecraft.species.flareon.name: Flareon
pokecraft.species.flareon.desc: Flames burn within a saclike organ inside this Pokémon. When Flareon inhales, these flames grow in intensity, reaching a mighty 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokecraft.species.porygon.name: Porygon
pokecraft.species.porygon.desc: It has no discernible heartbeat and does not seem to draw breath, and yet it appears to function without issue. I cannot even begin to explain this utterly bizarre anomaly.
pokecraft.species.omanyte.name: Omanyte
pokecraft.species.omanyte.desc: This Pokémon is a member of an ancient, extinct species. Omanyte paddles through water with its 10 tentacles, looking like it’s just drifting along.
pokecraft.species.omastar.name: Omastar
pokecraft.species.omastar.desc: Omastar’s sharp fangs could crush rock, but the Pokémon can attack only the prey that come within reach of its tentacles.
pokecraft.species.kabuto.name: Kabuto
pokecraft.species.kabuto.desc: While some say this species has gone extinct, Kabuto sightings are apparently fairly common in some places.
pokecraft.species.kabutops.name: Kabutops
pokecraft.species.kabutops.desc: The cause behind the extinction of this species is unknown. Kabutops were aggressive Pokémon that inhabited warm seas.
pokecraft.species.aerodactyl.name: Aerodactyl
pokecraft.species.aerodactyl.desc: Aerodactyl’s sawlike fangs can shred skin to tatters—even the skin of Steel-type Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.snorlax.name: Snorlax
pokecraft.species.snorlax.desc: This glutton appears in villages without warning and devours the entirety of their rice granaries—such occurrences have long been counted among the gravest of disasters.
pokecraft.species.articuno.name: Articuno
pokecraft.species.articuno.desc: This Pokémon can control ice at will. Articuno is said to live in snowy mountains riddled with permafrost.
pokecraft.species.zapdos.name: Zapdos
pokecraft.species.zapdos.desc: Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokémon. It’s said that when Zapdos rubs its feathers together, lightning will fall immediately after.
pokecraft.species.moltres.name: Moltres
pokecraft.species.moltres.desc: There are stories of this Pokémon using its radiant, flame-cloaked wings to light up paths for those lost in the mountains.
pokecraft.species.dratini.name: Dratini
pokecraft.species.dratini.desc: This Pokémon was long considered to be no more than a myth. The small lump on a Dratini’s forehead is actually a horn that’s still coming in.
pokecraft.species.dragonair.name: Dragonair
pokecraft.species.dragonair.desc: This Pokémon gathers power in the orbs on its tail and controls the weather. When enshrouded by an aura, Dragonair has a mystical appearance.
pokecraft.species.dragonite.name: Dragonite
pokecraft.species.dragonite.desc: This Pokémon is known as the Sea Incarnate. Figureheads that resemble Dragonite decorate the bows of many ships.
pokecraft.species.mewtwo.name: Mewtwo
pokecraft.species.mewtwo.desc: Its DNA is almost the same as Mew’s. However, its size and disposition are vastly different.
pokecraft.species.mew.name: Mew
pokecraft.species.mew.desc: When viewed through a microscope, this Pokémon’s short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.
pokecraft.species.chikorita.name: Chikorita
pokecraft.species.chikorita.desc: In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.
pokecraft.species.bayleef.name: Bayleef
pokecraft.species.bayleef.desc: Bayleef’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.
pokecraft.species.meganium.name: Meganium
pokecraft.species.meganium.desc: The fragrance of Meganium’s flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.
pokecraft.species.cyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
pokecraft.species.cyndaquil.desc: Hails from the Johto region. Though usually curled into a ball due to its timid disposition, it harbors tremendous firepower.
pokecraft.species.quilava.name: Quilava
pokecraft.species.quilava.desc: This creature's fur is most mysterious—it is wholly impervious to the burning touch of flame. Should Quilava turn its back to you, take heed! Such a posture indicates a forthcoming attack.
pokecraft.species.typhlosion.name: Typhlosion
pokecraft.species.typhlosion.desc: Said to purify lost, forsaken souls with its flames and guide them to the afterlife. I believe its form has been influenced by the energy of the sacred mountain towering at Hisui's center.
pokecraft.species.totodile.name: Totodile
pokecraft.species.totodile.desc: Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile’s jaws are very powerful. While the Pokémon may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.
pokecraft.species.croconaw.name: Croconaw
pokecraft.species.croconaw.desc: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.
pokecraft.species.feraligatr.name: Feraligatr
pokecraft.species.feraligatr.desc: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.
pokecraft.species.sentret.name: Sentret
pokecraft.species.sentret.desc: When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.
pokecraft.species.furret.name: Furret
pokecraft.species.furret.desc: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.
pokecraft.species.hoothoot.name: Hoothoot
pokecraft.species.hoothoot.desc: It begins to hoot at the same time every day. Some Trainers use them in place of clocks.
pokecraft.species.noctowl.name: Noctowl
pokecraft.species.noctowl.desc: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.
pokecraft.species.ledyba.name: Ledyba
pokecraft.species.ledyba.desc: These very cowardly Pokémon join together and use Reflect to protect their nest.
pokecraft.species.ledian.name: Ledian
pokecraft.species.ledian.desc: It flies through the night sky, sprinkling sparkly dust. According to some, if that dust sticks to you, good things will happen to you.
pokecraft.species.spinarak.name: Spinarak
pokecraft.species.spinarak.desc: Although the poison from its fangs isn’t that strong, it’s potent enough to weaken prey that gets caught in its web.
pokecraft.species.ariados.name: Ariados
pokecraft.species.ariados.desc: It spews threads from its mouth to catch its prey. When night falls, it leaves its web to go hunt aggressively.
pokecraft.species.crobat.name: Crobat
pokecraft.species.crobat.desc: Its hind limbs have become another set of wings. Crobat expertly maneuvers its four wings to dart in exquisite fashion through even the most confined caves without losing any speed.
pokecraft.species.chinchou.name: Chinchou
pokecraft.species.chinchou.desc: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.
pokecraft.species.lanturn.name: Lanturn
pokecraft.species.lanturn.desc: This Pokémon flashes a bright light that blinds its prey. This creates an opening for it to deliver an electrical attack.
pokecraft.species.pichu.name: Pichu
pokecraft.species.pichu.desc: Pichu stores electricity in the sacs on its cheeks but discharges it inadvertently when agitated or excited. Being yet immature, the Pokémon's handling of electricity is rather inept.
pokecraft.species.cleffa.name: Cleffa
pokecraft.species.cleffa.desc: In silhouette, they resemble twinkling starlight. When shooting stars rain from the night sky, Cleffa gather in numbers and dance as though they are indeed incarnations of the stars.
pokecraft.species.igglybuff.name: Igglybuff
pokecraft.species.igglybuff.desc: Taking advantage of the softness of its body, Igglybuff moves as if bouncing. Its body turns a deep pink when its temperature rises.
pokecraft.species.togepi.name: Togepi
pokecraft.species.togepi.desc: This ovate creature is frequently mistaken for a moving egg when encountered out in the fields or in the mountains. Its guileless smile soothes the soul.
pokecraft.species.togetic.name: Togetic
pokecraft.species.togetic.desc: No records exist of Togetic being seen in the wilds. Rumors abound that it evolves under the loving care of a trusted human companion, upon whom the Pokémon then bestows great joy.
pokecraft.species.natu.name: Natu
pokecraft.species.natu.desc: Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
pokecraft.species.xatu.name: Xatu
pokecraft.species.xatu.desc: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.
pokecraft.species.mareep.name: Mareep
pokecraft.species.mareep.desc: Rubbing its fleece generates electricity. You’ll want to pet it because it’s cute, but if you use your bare hand, you’ll get a painful shock.
pokecraft.species.flaaffy.name: Flaaffy
pokecraft.species.flaaffy.desc: It stores electricity in its fluffy fleece. If it stores up too much, it will start to go bald in those patches.
pokecraft.species.ampharos.name: Ampharos
pokecraft.species.ampharos.desc: Its tail shines bright and strong. It has been prized since long ago as a beacon for sailors.
pokecraft.species.bellossom.name: Bellossom
pokecraft.species.bellossom.desc: Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
pokecraft.species.marill.name: Marill
pokecraft.species.marill.desc: Even after Marill swims in a cold sea, its water- repellent fur dries almost as soon as Marill leaves the water. That’s why this Pokémon is never cold.
pokecraft.species.azumarill.name: Azumarill
pokecraft.species.azumarill.desc: These Pokémon create air-filled bubbles. When Azurill play in rivers, Azumarill will cover them with these bubbles.
pokecraft.species.sudowoodo.name: Sudowoodo
pokecraft.species.sudowoodo.desc: Though it pretends to be a tree, it fails to fool even children. To the touch, its body feels more like rock than tree bark. Sudowoodo's extreme aversion to water merits special note.
pokecraft.species.politoed.name: Politoed
pokecraft.species.politoed.desc: The cry of a male is louder than that of a female. Male Politoed with deep, menacing voices find more popularity with the opposite gender.
pokecraft.species.hoppip.name: Hoppip
pokecraft.species.hoppip.desc: This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with other Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.
pokecraft.species.skiploom.name: Skiploom
pokecraft.species.skiploom.desc: Skiploom’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens depends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémon is sometimes used as a thermometer.
pokecraft.species.jumpluff.name: Jumpluff
pokecraft.species.jumpluff.desc: Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.
pokecraft.species.aipom.name: Aipom
pokecraft.species.aipom.desc: This treetop dweller possesses a tail as dexterous as a hand. Ancient writings describe this Pokémon as a one-armed oddity.
pokecraft.species.sunkern.name: Sunkern
pokecraft.species.sunkern.desc: Sunkern tries to move as little as it possibly can. It does so because it tries to conserve all the nutrients it has stored in its body for its evolution. It will not eat a thing, subsisting only on morning dew.
pokecraft.species.sunflora.name: Sunflora
pokecraft.species.sunflora.desc: Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes down for the night.
pokecraft.species.yanma.name: Yanma
pokecraft.species.yanma.desc: Its frail wings are so thin that one can see clear through them. However, during flight these wings exhibit the power to churn air with force enough to launch a house skyward.
pokecraft.species.wooper.name: Wooper
pokecraft.species.wooper.desc: When walking on land, it covers its body with a poisonous film that keeps its skin from dehydrating.
pokecraft.species.quagsire.name: Quagsire
pokecraft.species.quagsire.desc: Its body is always slimy. It often bangs its head on the river bottom as it swims but seems not to care.
pokecraft.species.espeon.name: Espeon
pokecraft.species.espeon.desc: Wields an arcane power with which it can predict the weather and even people's thoughts. When bathed in sunshine, the scarlet orb on its brow glows and builds energy.
pokecraft.species.umbreon.name: Umbreon
pokecraft.species.umbreon.desc: It is most active in the wee hours of the night, when moonlight bathes the land. Its large eyes can pierce the darkness and perceive prey with absolute clarity.
pokecraft.species.murkrow.name: Murkrow
pokecraft.species.murkrow.desc: Widely shunned as a bearer of ill fortune. Upon crossing paths with this creature, I've been told one must chant ”Workrum, Workrum—bad luck, don't come” as a protective incantation.
pokecraft.species.slowking.name: Slowking
pokecraft.species.slowking.desc: Slowking can solve any problem presented to it, but no one can understand a thing Slowking says.
pokecraft.species.misdreavus.name: Misdreavus
pokecraft.species.misdreavus.desc: It conceals itself in darkness, sending chills up travelers' spines with its childlike weeping. As it observes the frightened travelers with glee, the red orbs upon its chest let off an eerie light.
pokecraft.species.unown.name: Unown
pokecraft.species.unown.desc: It is hard to believe these strangely shaped Pokémon are truly living creatures. I've pointed out that the species' many forms resemble writing from other lands; no one will take me seriously.
pokecraft.species.wobbuffet.name: Wobbuffet
pokecraft.species.wobbuffet.desc: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.
pokecraft.species.girafarig.name: Girafarig
pokecraft.species.girafarig.desc: Girafarig’s rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for thinking. However, the rear head doesn’t need to sleep, so it can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.
pokecraft.species.pineco.name: Pineco
pokecraft.species.pineco.desc: It sticks tree bark to itself with its saliva, making itself thicker and larger. Elderly Pineco are ridiculously huge.
pokecraft.species.forretress.name: Forretress
pokecraft.species.forretress.desc: In the moment that it gulps down its prey, the inside of its shell is exposed, but to this day, no one has ever seen that sight.
pokecraft.species.dunsparce.name: Dunsparce
pokecraft.species.dunsparce.desc: The nests Dunsparce live in are mazes of tunnels. They never get lost in their own nests—they can tell where they are by the scent of the dirt.
pokecraft.species.gligar.name: Gligar
pokecraft.species.gligar.desc: Its tail is tipped by a thick, horrible stinger. To bring down prey, it will first obscure their vision by covering their faces with its body, and then it will use the stinger to inject them with venom.
pokecraft.species.steelix.name: Steelix
pokecraft.species.steelix.desc: This Pokémon evolved through use of a strange item. Its body is coated with steel powder and notably hard—not even diamond can leave so much as a scratch.
pokecraft.species.snubbull.name: Snubbull
pokecraft.species.snubbull.desc: In contrast to its appearance, it’s quite timid. When playing with other puppy Pokémon, it sometimes gets bullied.
pokecraft.species.granbull.name: Granbull
pokecraft.species.granbull.desc: Although it’s popular with young people, Granbull is timid and sensitive, so it’s totally incompetent as a watchdog.
pokecraft.species.qwilfish.name: Qwilfish
pokecraft.species.qwilfish.desc: Fishers detest this troublesome Pokémon because it sprays poison from its spines, getting it everywhere. A different form of Qwilfish lives in other regions.
pokecraft.species.scizor.name: Scizor
pokecraft.species.scizor.desc: Evolved by way of a curious item. The shell covering its body has been shown to be stronger than forged steel.
pokecraft.species.shuckle.name: Shuckle
pokecraft.species.shuckle.desc: The berries stored in its vaselike shell eventually become a thick, pulpy juice.
pokecraft.species.heracross.name: Heracross
pokecraft.species.heracross.desc: This Pokémon has an unparalleled horn. Heracross itself demonstrates tremendous power—it's capable of throwing several people trained in the traditional arts of war at once.
pokecraft.species.sneasel.name: Sneasel
pokecraft.species.sneasel.desc: Its sturdy, curved claws are ideal for traversing precipitous cliffs. From the tips of these claws drips a venom that infiltrates the nerves of any prey caught in Sneasel's grasp.
pokecraft.species.teddiursa.name: Teddiursa
pokecraft.species.teddiursa.desc: It licks its paws because of the sweet honey that has soaked into them. It is cunning, stealing into the nests of Combee and taking for itself the honey that the Combee have amassed.
pokecraft.species.ursaring.name: Ursaring
pokecraft.species.ursaring.desc: When the cold season arrives in Hisui, this Pokémon will wander fields and mountains alike in search of its favorite berries. Ursaring's hunger during this time makes it a ferocious danger.
pokecraft.species.slugma.name: Slugma
pokecraft.species.slugma.desc: Slugma does not have any blood in its body. Instead, intensely hot magma circulates throughout this Pokémon’s body, carrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.
pokecraft.species.magcargo.name: Magcargo
pokecraft.species.magcargo.desc: Magcargo’s body temperature is approximately 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact. If this Pokémon is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantly turn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.
pokecraft.species.swinub.name: Swinub
pokecraft.species.swinub.desc: Swinub excels at sniffing out mushrooms buried beneath grass or snow. Since ancient times, the people of Hisui have often relied upon this skill.
pokecraft.species.piloswine.name: Piloswine
pokecraft.species.piloswine.desc: The long fur of this Pokémon covers its eyes, ears, and even limbs, allowing Piloswine to resist harshly frigid conditions. The Pokémon's white tusks can be used to defeat its enemies.
pokecraft.species.corsola.name: Corsola
pokecraft.species.corsola.desc: These Pokémon live in warm seas. In prehistoric times, many lived in the oceans around the Galar region as well.
pokecraft.species.remoraid.name: Remoraid
pokecraft.species.remoraid.desc: Spits water from its mouth with incredible accuracy. It captures Burmy by shooting them down off the branches from which they dangle.
pokecraft.species.octillery.name: Octillery
pokecraft.species.octillery.desc: While Octillery still shoots water from its mouth, the drastic anatomical difference between it and Remoraid meant that for a long time, no one believed the former evolved from the latter.
pokecraft.species.delibird.name: Delibird
pokecraft.species.delibird.desc: It has a generous habit of sharing its food with people and Pokémon, so it’s always scrounging around for more food.
pokecraft.species.mantine.name: Mantine
pokecraft.species.mantine.desc: This calm and gentle Pokémon swims gracefully through the sea. After building speed, it can leap out of the water. It is often misidentified as a bird Pokémon due to this behavior.
pokecraft.species.skarmory.name: Skarmory
pokecraft.species.skarmory.desc: People fashion swords from Skarmory’s shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.
pokecraft.species.houndour.name: Houndour
pokecraft.species.houndour.desc: They make repeated eerie howls before dawn to call attention to their pack.
pokecraft.species.houndoom.name: Houndoom
pokecraft.species.houndoom.desc: Identifiable by its eerie howls, people a long time ago thought it was the grim reaper and feared it.
pokecraft.species.kingdra.name: Kingdra
pokecraft.species.kingdra.desc: Scales shed by this Pokémon have such a splendorous gleam to them that they’ve been given to royalty as gifts.
pokecraft.species.phanpy.name: Phanpy
pokecraft.species.phanpy.desc: Phanpy uses its long nose to shower itself. When others gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water. These Pokémon can be seen drying their soaking-wet bodies at the edge of water.
pokecraft.species.donphan.name: Donphan
pokecraft.species.donphan.desc: If Donphan were to tackle with its hard body, even a house could be destroyed. Using its massive strength, the Pokémon helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.
pokecraft.species.porygon2.name: Porygon2
pokecraft.species.porygon2.desc: A bizarre item caused this Pokémon to evolve. While it now exhibits many new gestures and expressions, its biology remains inscrutable.
pokecraft.species.stantler.name: Stantler
pokecraft.species.stantler.desc: Its strangely shaped antlers have the power to bewitch those who see them. Medicine made by grinding up the black orbs from fallen antlers is an effective treatment for insomnia.
pokecraft.species.smeargle.name: Smeargle
pokecraft.species.smeargle.desc: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.
pokecraft.species.tyrogue.name: Tyrogue
pokecraft.species.tyrogue.desc: Even though it is small, it can’t be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.
pokecraft.species.hitmontop.name: Hitmontop
pokecraft.species.hitmontop.desc: After doing a handstand to throw off the opponent’s timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.
pokecraft.species.smoochum.name: Smoochum
pokecraft.species.smoochum.desc: This is a very curious Pokémon. Smoochum decides what it likes and dislikes by touching things with its lips.
pokecraft.species.elekid.name: Elekid
pokecraft.species.elekid.desc: They generate electricity by spinning their arms. During a thunderstorm, if one hears the lively voices of children out in the wilderness, what one is actually hearing are the voices of Elekid.
pokecraft.species.magby.name: Magby
pokecraft.species.magby.desc: This Pokémon lives in volcanic areas. With each breath, sparks spurt from its mouth and nose. When Magby is in good health, its flames gain a yellow tint.
pokecraft.species.miltank.name: Miltank
pokecraft.species.miltank.desc: This Pokémon needs to be milked every day, or else it will fall ill. The flavor of Miltank milk changes with the seasons.
pokecraft.species.blissey.name: Blissey
pokecraft.species.blissey.desc: A kindhearted Pokémon that will care for any sick person or Pokémon until their health improves. The eggs it lays are delicious and bring good fortune to those who eat them.
pokecraft.species.raikou.name: Raikou
pokecraft.species.raikou.desc: Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this Pokémon send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down.
pokecraft.species.entei.name: Entei
pokecraft.species.entei.desc: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.
pokecraft.species.suicune.name: Suicune
pokecraft.species.suicune.desc: Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gracefulness. This Pokémon has the power to purify dirty water.
pokecraft.species.larvitar.name: Larvitar
pokecraft.species.larvitar.desc: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.
pokecraft.species.pupitar.name: Pupitar
pokecraft.species.pupitar.desc: It will not stay still, even while it’s a pupa. It already has arms and legs under its solid shell.
pokecraft.species.tyranitar.name: Tyranitar
pokecraft.species.tyranitar.desc: The quakes caused when it walks make even great mountains crumble and change the surrounding terrain.
pokecraft.species.lugia.name: Lugia
pokecraft.species.lugia.desc: Lugia’s wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this Pokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.
pokecraft.species.hooh.name: Ho-Oh
pokecraft.species.hooh.desc: Ho-Oh’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.
pokecraft.species.celebi.name: Celebi
pokecraft.species.celebi.desc: This Pokémon traveled through time to come from the future. It bolsters grass and trees with its own strength, and it can heal wounds, too.
pokecraft.species.treecko.name: Treecko
pokecraft.species.treecko.desc: Treecko is cool, calm, and collected—it never panics under any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this Pokémon, it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.
pokecraft.species.grovyle.name: Grovyle
pokecraft.species.grovyle.desc: This Pokémon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no Pokémon can ever hope to catch a fleeing Grovyle however fast they may be.
pokecraft.species.sceptile.name: Sceptile
pokecraft.species.sceptile.desc: Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pokémon raises the trees in a forest with loving care.
pokecraft.species.torchic.name: Torchic
pokecraft.species.torchic.desc: Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame. Give it a hug—it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokémon is covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.
pokecraft.species.combusken.name: Combusken
pokecraft.species.combusken.desc: Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This Pokémon’s cry is very loud and distracting.
pokecraft.species.blaziken.name: Blaziken
pokecraft.species.blaziken.desc: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.
pokecraft.species.mudkip.name: Mudkip
pokecraft.species.mudkip.desc: In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokémon will unleash its amazing power—it can crush rocks bigger than itself.
pokecraft.species.marshtomp.name: Marshtomp
pokecraft.species.marshtomp.desc: Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This Pokémon’s hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.
pokecraft.species.swampert.name: Swampert
pokecraft.species.swampert.desc: Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.
pokecraft.species.poochyena.name: Poochyena
pokecraft.species.poochyena.desc: Poochyena is an omnivore—it will eat anything. A distinguishing feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This Pokémon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its tail bristle out.
pokecraft.species.mightyena.name: Mightyena
pokecraft.species.mightyena.desc: Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey only those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.
pokecraft.species.zigzagoon.name: Zigzagoon
pokecraft.species.zigzagoon.desc: Zigzagoon that adapted to regions outside Galar acquired this appearance. If you’ve lost something, this Pokémon can likely find it.
pokecraft.species.linoone.name: Linoone
pokecraft.species.linoone.desc: It uses its explosive speed and razor-sharp claws to bring down prey. Running along winding paths is not its strong suit.
pokecraft.species.wurmple.name: Wurmple
pokecraft.species.wurmple.desc: Likes sap and is abundant in the wild. Why it evolves into various different forms is unknown. One cannot tell from a Wurmple's appearance which form it will take when it evolves.
pokecraft.species.silcoon.name: Silcoon
pokecraft.species.silcoon.desc: Wraps itself in thin strings of silk while it stores energy for evolution. It can't extend its limbs and its movement is slow, but its eyes keep a sharp lookout—Silcoon is always on guard.
pokecraft.species.beautifly.name: Beautifly
pokecraft.species.beautifly.desc: A colorful and incredibly beautiful but also greedy Pokémon. In an effort to keep its favorite food all to itself, it will chase away Combee as they try to gather nectar.
pokecraft.species.cascoon.name: Cascoon
pokecraft.species.cascoon.desc: The silk coating its body is thin but sufficiently strong. Cascoon's silk has a luster and texture superior to that of Silcoon's, and clothes made using Cascoon silk are regarded as top-notch.
pokecraft.species.dustox.name: Dustox
pokecraft.species.dustox.desc: Tends to be drawn to bonfires on dark nights. Difficult to chase away from settlements because of the way it scatters highly toxic scales.
pokecraft.species.lotad.name: Lotad
pokecraft.species.lotad.desc: Its leaf grew too large for it to live on land. That is how it began to live floating in the water.
pokecraft.species.lombre.name: Lombre
pokecraft.species.lombre.desc: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.
pokecraft.species.ludicolo.name: Ludicolo
pokecraft.species.ludicolo.desc: If it hears festive music, it begins moving in rhythm in order to amplify its power.
pokecraft.species.seedot.name: Seedot
pokecraft.species.seedot.desc: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
pokecraft.species.nuzleaf.name: Nuzleaf
pokecraft.species.nuzleaf.desc: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of Nuzleaf’s grass flute fills listeners with dread.
pokecraft.species.shiftry.name: Shiftry
pokecraft.species.shiftry.desc: It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.
pokecraft.species.taillow.name: Taillow
pokecraft.species.taillow.desc: Taillow is young—it has only just left its nest. As a result, it sometimes becomes lonesome and cries at night. This Pokémon feeds on Wurmple that live in forests.
pokecraft.species.swellow.name: Swellow
pokecraft.species.swellow.desc: Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy wings. Once two Swellow are gathered, they diligently take care of cleaning each other’s wings.
pokecraft.species.wingull.name: Wingull
pokecraft.species.wingull.desc: It soars on updrafts without flapping its wings. It makes a nest on sheer cliffs at the sea’s edge.
pokecraft.species.pelipper.name: Pelipper
pokecraft.species.pelipper.desc: Skimming the water’s surface, it dips its large bill in the sea, scoops up food and water, and carries it.
pokecraft.species.ralts.name: Ralts
pokecraft.species.ralts.desc: Tends to prefer people with a chipper disposition to those who are gloomy, but it has shown no discrimination with regard to age or gender. Needs more research.
pokecraft.species.kirlia.name: Kirlia
pokecraft.species.kirlia.desc: It resembles a maiden in appearance, but it wields strange powers to project visions of paradise. I suspect the crimson ornaments on its head are the key to its abilities.
pokecraft.species.gardevoir.name: Gardevoir
pokecraft.species.gardevoir.desc: It will dedicate itself to defending a master it has come to adore. Its pure white dress, reminiscent of those worn by ladies of nobility, is the dress of one who is willing to risk their life.
pokecraft.species.surskit.name: Surskit
pokecraft.species.surskit.desc: It lives in ponds and marshes that feature lots of plant life. It often fights with Dewpider, whose habitat and diet are similar.
pokecraft.species.masquerain.name: Masquerain
pokecraft.species.masquerain.desc: Its thin, winglike antennae are highly absorbent. It waits out rainy days in tree hollows.
pokecraft.species.shroomish.name: Shroomish
pokecraft.species.shroomish.desc: If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters spores from the top of its head. This Pokémon’s spores are so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.
pokecraft.species.breloom.name: Breloom
pokecraft.species.breloom.desc: The seeds ringing Breloom’s tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this Pokémon’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.
pokecraft.species.slakoth.name: Slakoth
pokecraft.species.slakoth.desc: Slakoth’s heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens, it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this Pokémon in motion.
pokecraft.species.vigoroth.name: Vigoroth
pokecraft.species.vigoroth.desc: Vigoroth is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it tries to sleep, the blood in its veins grows agitated, compelling this Pokémon to run wild throughout the jungle before it can settle down.
pokecraft.species.slaking.name: Slaking
pokecraft.species.slaking.desc: Wherever Slaking live, rings of over a yard in diameter appear in grassy fields. They are made by the Pokémon as it eats all the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.
pokecraft.species.nincada.name: Nincada
pokecraft.species.nincada.desc: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.
pokecraft.species.ninjask.name: Ninjask
pokecraft.species.ninjask.desc: This Pokémon is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.
pokecraft.species.shedinja.name: Shedinja
pokecraft.species.shedinja.desc: A strange Pokémon—it flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does not breathe.
pokecraft.species.whismur.name: Whismur
pokecraft.species.whismur.desc: When Whismur cries, the sound of its own voice startles it, making the Pokémon cry even louder. It cries until it’s exhausted, then it falls asleep.
pokecraft.species.loudred.name: Loudred
pokecraft.species.loudred.desc: The force of this Pokémon’s loud voice isn’t just the sound—it’s also the wave of air pressure that blows opponents away and damages them.
pokecraft.species.exploud.name: Exploud
pokecraft.species.exploud.desc: This Pokémon can do more than just shout. To communicate with others of its kind, it’ll emit all sorts of sounds from the holes in its body.
pokecraft.species.makuhita.name: Makuhita
pokecraft.species.makuhita.desc: There’s a rumor of a traditional recipe for stew that Trainers can use to raise strong Makuhita.
pokecraft.species.hariyama.name: Hariyama
pokecraft.species.hariyama.desc: Hariyama that are big and fat aren’t necessarily strong. There are some small ones that move nimbly and use moves skillfully.
pokecraft.species.azurill.name: Azurill
pokecraft.species.azurill.desc: Although Azurill are normally docile, an angry one will swing around the big ball on its tail and try to smash its opponents.
pokecraft.species.nosepass.name: Nosepass
pokecraft.species.nosepass.desc: Once the people of Hisui discovered that its red nose always points north, they grew to rely on it greatly when traveling afar. The nose seems to work in a similar way to ancient compasses.
pokecraft.species.skitty.name: Skitty
pokecraft.species.skitty.desc: Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail. In the wild, this Pokémon lives in holes in the trees of forests. It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.
pokecraft.species.delcatty.name: Delcatty
pokecraft.species.delcatty.desc: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.
pokecraft.species.sableye.name: Sableye
pokecraft.species.sableye.desc: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.
pokecraft.species.mawile.name: Mawile
pokecraft.species.mawile.desc: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.
pokecraft.species.aron.name: Aron
pokecraft.species.aron.desc: When Aron evolves, its steel armor peels off. In ancient times, people would collect Aron’s shed armor and make good use of it in their daily lives.
pokecraft.species.lairon.name: Lairon
pokecraft.species.lairon.desc: During territorial disputes, Lairon fight by slamming into each other. Close inspection of their steel armor reveals scratches and dents.
pokecraft.species.aggron.name: Aggron
pokecraft.species.aggron.desc: Long ago, there was a king who wore a helmet meant to resemble the head of an Aggron. He was trying to channel the Pokémon’s strength.
pokecraft.species.meditite.name: Meditite
pokecraft.species.meditite.desc: Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this Pokémon’s training.
pokecraft.species.medicham.name: Medicham
pokecraft.species.medicham.desc: Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.
pokecraft.species.electrike.name: Electrike
pokecraft.species.electrike.desc: It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.
pokecraft.species.manectric.name: Manectric
pokecraft.species.manectric.desc: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
pokecraft.species.plusle.name: Plusle
pokecraft.species.plusle.desc: When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this Pokémon cries loudly.
pokecraft.species.minun.name: Minun
pokecraft.species.minun.desc: Minun loves to cheer on its partner in battle. It gives off sparks from its body while it is doing so. If its partner is in trouble, this Pokémon gives off increasing amounts of sparks.
pokecraft.species.volbeat.name: Volbeat
pokecraft.species.volbeat.desc: Volbeat’s tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat, it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky. This Pokémon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.
pokecraft.species.illumise.name: Illumise
pokecraft.species.illumise.desc: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.
pokecraft.species.roselia.name: Roselia
pokecraft.species.roselia.desc: Though beautiful, it has highly poisonous thorns. There is an old tradition in my homeland wherein one would send these thorns to an opponent to challenge them to a duel.
pokecraft.species.gulpin.name: Gulpin
pokecraft.species.gulpin.desc: Most of Gulpin’s body is made up of its stomach—its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon’s stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.
pokecraft.species.swalot.name: Swalot
pokecraft.species.swalot.desc: Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this Pokémon’s mouth.
pokecraft.species.carvanha.name: Carvanha
pokecraft.species.carvanha.desc: These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.
pokecraft.species.sharpedo.name: Sharpedo
pokecraft.species.sharpedo.desc: This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sea. Any ship entering the waters Sharpedo calls home will be attacked—no exceptions.
pokecraft.species.wailmer.name: Wailmer
pokecraft.species.wailmer.desc: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.
pokecraft.species.wailord.name: Wailord
pokecraft.species.wailord.desc: Its immense size is the reason for its popularity. Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing activity in various parts of the world.
pokecraft.species.numel.name: Numel
pokecraft.species.numel.desc: Numel stores magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit within its body. If it gets wet, the magma cools and hardens. In that event, the Pokémon’s body grows heavy and its movements become sluggish.
pokecraft.species.camerupt.name: Camerupt
pokecraft.species.camerupt.desc: The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
pokecraft.species.torkoal.name: Torkoal
pokecraft.species.torkoal.desc: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
pokecraft.species.spoink.name: Spoink
pokecraft.species.spoink.desc: Spoink keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to amplify this Pokémon’s psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on a constant search for a bigger pearl.
pokecraft.species.grumpig.name: Grumpig
pokecraft.species.grumpig.desc: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This Pokémon’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.
pokecraft.species.spinda.name: Spinda
pokecraft.species.spinda.desc: Each Spinda’s spot pattern is different. With its stumbling movements, it evades opponents’ attacks brilliantly!
pokecraft.species.trapinch.name: Trapinch
pokecraft.species.trapinch.desc: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
pokecraft.species.vibrava.name: Vibrava
pokecraft.species.vibrava.desc: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.
pokecraft.species.flygon.name: Flygon
pokecraft.species.flygon.desc: It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.
pokecraft.species.cacnea.name: Cacnea
pokecraft.species.cacnea.desc: The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokémon battles by wildly swinging its thorny arms.
pokecraft.species.cacturne.name: Cacturne
pokecraft.species.cacturne.desc: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.
pokecraft.species.swablu.name: Swablu
pokecraft.species.swablu.desc: Since Swablu looks like a cumulus cloud, foes can have a hard time finding it. Apparently its wings turned white over many generations.
pokecraft.species.altaria.name: Altaria
pokecraft.species.altaria.desc: This Pokémon has a kind disposition, but if it’s provoked, it will threaten opponents with shrill cries before attacking them without mercy.
pokecraft.species.zangoose.name: Zangoose
pokecraft.species.zangoose.desc: Zangoose usually stays on all fours, but when angered, it gets up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This Pokémon shares a bitter rivalry with Seviper that dates back over generations.
pokecraft.species.seviper.name: Seviper
pokecraft.species.seviper.desc: Seviper’s swordlike tail serves two purposes—it slashes foes and douses them with secreted poison. This Pokémon will not give up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.
pokecraft.species.lunatone.name: Lunatone
pokecraft.species.lunatone.desc: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.
pokecraft.species.solrock.name: Solrock
pokecraft.species.solrock.desc: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
pokecraft.species.barboach.name: Barboach
pokecraft.species.barboach.desc: Makes its home in swamps with murky water. The poor visibility hides this Pokémon from predators, and the slime on its body makes grasping it difficult.
pokecraft.species.whiscash.name: Whiscash
pokecraft.species.whiscash.desc: Strikes its caudal fin against the swamp bed to shake the ground and startle its prey. It will then swallow the fleeing prey whole. People mistook this behavior as the cause of earthquakes.
pokecraft.species.corphish.name: Corphish
pokecraft.species.corphish.desc: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
pokecraft.species.crawdaunt.name: Crawdaunt
pokecraft.species.crawdaunt.desc: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
pokecraft.species.baltoy.name: Baltoy
pokecraft.species.baltoy.desc: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
pokecraft.species.claydol.name: Claydol
pokecraft.species.claydol.desc: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
pokecraft.species.lileep.name: Lileep
pokecraft.species.lileep.desc: Lileep clings to rocks on the seabed. When prey comes close, this Pokémon entangles it with petallike tentacles.
pokecraft.species.cradily.name: Cradily
pokecraft.species.cradily.desc: Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles, it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.
pokecraft.species.anorith.name: Anorith
pokecraft.species.anorith.desc: Anorith can swim swiftly by pulling its eight wings through the water like oars on a boat. This Pokémon is an ancestor of modern bug Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.armaldo.name: Armaldo
pokecraft.species.armaldo.desc: Though it lives on land, it’s also a good swimmer. It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its sharp claws to take down its quarry.
pokecraft.species.feebas.name: Feebas
pokecraft.species.feebas.desc: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
pokecraft.species.milotic.name: Milotic
pokecraft.species.milotic.desc: It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.
pokecraft.species.castform.name: Castform
pokecraft.species.castform.desc: Its form changes depending on the weather. The rougher conditions get, the rougher Castform’s disposition!
pokecraft.species.kecleon.name: Kecleon
pokecraft.species.kecleon.desc: Its color changes for concealment and also when its mood or health changes. The darker the color, the healthier it is.
pokecraft.species.shuppet.name: Shuppet
pokecraft.species.shuppet.desc: There’s a proverb that says, “Shun the house where Shuppet gather in the growing dusk.”
pokecraft.species.banette.name: Banette
pokecraft.species.banette.desc: Resentment at being cast off made it spring into being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.
pokecraft.species.duskull.name: Duskull
pokecraft.species.duskull.desc: I've heard that the children of Hisui all begin to behave once they've been told the story of how this Pokémon roams about before the witching hour to spirit away misbehaving children.
pokecraft.species.dusclops.name: Dusclops
pokecraft.species.dusclops.desc: There are rumors that peeking inside its bandage-wrapped body will cause one to get pulled in through the gaps between the bandages, never to return. I've been too scared to verify.
pokecraft.species.tropius.name: Tropius
pokecraft.species.tropius.desc: Bunches of delicious fruit grow around its neck. In warm areas, many ranches raise Tropius.
pokecraft.species.chimecho.name: Chimecho
pokecraft.species.chimecho.desc: Can emit waves of air powerful enough to knock out prey taller than itself. I hypothesize that it amplifies the faint sound of wind within its body.
pokecraft.species.absol.name: Absol
pokecraft.species.absol.desc: Because of this Pokémon’s ability to detect danger, people mistook Absol as a bringer of doom.
pokecraft.species.wynaut.name: Wynaut
pokecraft.species.wynaut.desc: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
pokecraft.species.snorunt.name: Snorunt
pokecraft.species.snorunt.desc: Arrives alongside the first snow. It's thought that homes Snorunt visit will prosper for many generations. By tradition, one might offer a lump of ice made from pure water at one's front door.
pokecraft.species.glalie.name: Glalie
pokecraft.species.glalie.desc: It covers its body with an armor of ice harder than steel. Uses its breath to freeze prey, which it then devours as if they were frozen desserts.
pokecraft.species.spheal.name: Spheal
pokecraft.species.spheal.desc: During the season when drift ice approaches the shore, Spheal prefers living on the ice—where fewer predators lurk—rather than the land. Its fur retains heat superbly and resists harsh cold.
pokecraft.species.sealeo.name: Sealeo
pokecraft.species.sealeo.desc: Its white whiskers are very sensitive. Sealeo will balance Spheal on the tip of its nose, checking its scent and its feel to be sure the Spheal is healthy.
pokecraft.species.walrein.name: Walrein
pokecraft.species.walrein.desc: Its thick tusks are strong enough to shatter drift ice. They have been known to break, but they will grow back by the next year. The Hisui region is well known for these broken tusks.
pokecraft.species.clamperl.name: Clamperl
pokecraft.species.clamperl.desc: Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious. They can be more than 10 times as costly as Shellder’s pearls.
pokecraft.species.huntail.name: Huntail
pokecraft.species.huntail.desc: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.
pokecraft.species.gorebyss.name: Gorebyss
pokecraft.species.gorebyss.desc: It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it becomes food for other Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.relicanth.name: Relicanth
pokecraft.species.relicanth.desc: This Pokémon was discovered during deep-sea exploration. Its appearance hasn’t changed in 100,000,000 years, so it’s called a living fossil.
pokecraft.species.luvdisc.name: Luvdisc
pokecraft.species.luvdisc.desc: Luvdisc makes its home in coral reefs in warm seas. It especially likes sleeping in the space between Corsola’s branches.
pokecraft.species.bagon.name: Bagon
pokecraft.species.bagon.desc: Bagon is a solitary Pokémon that doesn’t form groups with others of its kind. It also has a head hard enough to cleave a boulder in one strike.
pokecraft.species.shelgon.name: Shelgon
pokecraft.species.shelgon.desc: Shelgon ignores its hunger entirely, never eating any food. Apparently, Shelgon will evolve once all its energy stores are used up.
pokecraft.species.salamence.name: Salamence
pokecraft.species.salamence.desc: While basking in the joy of flight generally keeps this Pokémon in high spirits, Salamence turns into an uncontrollable menace if something angers it.
pokecraft.species.beldum.name: Beldum
pokecraft.species.beldum.desc: The cells in this Pokémon’s body are composed of magnetic material. Instead of blood, magnetic forces flow through Beldum’s body.
pokecraft.species.metang.name: Metang
pokecraft.species.metang.desc: Using magnetic forces to stay aloft, this Pokémon flies at high speeds, weaving through harsh mountain terrain in pursuit of prey.
pokecraft.species.metagross.name: Metagross
pokecraft.species.metagross.desc: Metagross is the result of the fusion of two Metang. This Pokémon defeats its opponents through use of its supercomputer-level brain.
pokecraft.species.regirock.name: Regirock
pokecraft.species.regirock.desc: Cutting-edge technology was used to study the internals of this Pokémon’s rock body, but nothing was found—not even a brain or a heart.
pokecraft.species.regice.name: Regice
pokecraft.species.regice.desc: This Pokémon’s body is made of solid ice. It’s said that Regice was born beneath thick ice in the ice age.
pokecraft.species.registeel.name: Registeel
pokecraft.species.registeel.desc: It’s rumored that this Pokémon was born deep underground in the planet’s mantle and that it emerged onto the surface 10,000 years ago.
pokecraft.species.latias.name: Latias
