pokecraft.species.steenee.desc: Any Corvisquire that pecks at this Pokémon will be greeted with a smack from its sepals followed by a sharp kick.
pokecraft.species.tsareena.name: Tsareena
pokecraft.species.tsareena.desc: A kick from the hardened tips of this Pokémon’s legs leaves a wound in the opponent’s body and soul that will never heal.
pokecraft.species.comfey.name: Comfey
pokecraft.species.comfey.desc: These Pokémon smell very nice. All Comfey wear different flowers, so each of these Pokémon has its own individual scent.
pokecraft.species.oranguru.name: Oranguru
pokecraft.species.oranguru.desc: It knows the forest inside and out. If it comes across a wounded Pokémon, Oranguru will gather medicinal herbs to treat it.
pokecraft.species.passimian.name: Passimian
pokecraft.species.passimian.desc: Passimian live in groups of about 20, with each member performing an assigned role. Through cooperation, the group survives.
pokecraft.species.wimpod.name: Wimpod
pokecraft.species.wimpod.desc: Wimpod gather in swarms, constantly on the lookout for danger. They scatter the moment they detect an enemy’s presence.
pokecraft.species.golisopod.name: Golisopod
pokecraft.species.golisopod.desc: They live in sunken ships or in holes in the seabed. When Golisopod and Grapploct battle, the loser becomes the winner’s meal.
pokecraft.species.sandygast.name: Sandygast
pokecraft.species.sandygast.desc: Sandygast mainly inhabits beaches. It takes control of anyone who puts their hand into its mouth, forcing them to make its body bigger.
pokecraft.species.palossand.name: Palossand
pokecraft.species.palossand.desc: This Pokémon lives on beaches, but it hates water. Palossand can’t maintain its castle-like shape if it gets drenched by a heavy rain.
pokecraft.species.pyukumuku.name: Pyukumuku
pokecraft.species.pyukumuku.desc: It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means to punch them.
pokecraft.species.typenull.name: Type: Null
pokecraft.species.typenull.desc: It was modeled after a mighty Pokémon of myth. The mask placed upon it limits its power in order to keep it under control.
pokecraft.species.silvally.name: Silvally
pokecraft.species.silvally.desc: The final factor needed to release this Pokémon’s true power was a strong bond with a Trainer it trusts.
pokecraft.species.minior.name: Minior
pokecraft.species.minior.desc: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.
pokecraft.species.komala.name: Komala
pokecraft.species.komala.desc: It remains asleep from birth to death as a result of the sedative properties of the leaves that form its diet.
pokecraft.species.turtonator.name: Turtonator
pokecraft.species.turtonator.desc: Eating sulfur in its volcanic habitat is what causes explosive compounds to develop in its shell. Its droppings are also dangerously explosive.
pokecraft.species.togedemaru.name: Togedemaru
pokecraft.species.togedemaru.desc: When it’s in trouble, it curls up into a ball, makes its fur spikes stand on end, and then discharges electricity indiscriminately.
pokecraft.species.mimikyu.name: Mimikyu
pokecraft.species.mimikyu.desc: There was a scientist who peeked under Mimikyu’s old rag in the name of research. The scientist died of a mysterious disease.
pokecraft.species.bruxish.name: Bruxish
pokecraft.species.bruxish.desc: Its skin is thick enough to fend off Mareanie’s spikes. With its robust teeth, Bruxish crunches up the spikes and eats them.
pokecraft.species.drampa.name: Drampa
pokecraft.species.drampa.desc: Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a gale and flattens everything around.
pokecraft.species.dhelmise.name: Dhelmise
pokecraft.species.dhelmise.desc: After lowering its anchor, it waits for its prey. It catches large Wailord and drains their life-force.
pokecraft.species.jangmoo.name: Jangmo-o
pokecraft.species.jangmoo.desc: Jangmo-o strikes its scales to communicate with others of its kind. Its scales are actually fur that’s become as hard as metal.
pokecraft.species.hakamoo.name: Hakamo-o
pokecraft.species.hakamoo.desc: Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its scales together and roars. Its sharp claws shred the opposition.
pokecraft.species.kommoo.name: Kommo-o
pokecraft.species.kommoo.desc: Certain ruins have paintings of ancient warriors wearing armor made of Kommo-o scales.
pokecraft.species.tapukoko.name: Tapu Koko
pokecraft.species.tapukoko.desc: The lightning-wielding guardian deity of Melemele, Tapu Koko is brimming with curiosity and appears before people from time to time.
pokecraft.species.tapulele.name: Tapu Lele
pokecraft.species.tapulele.desc: Although called a guardian deity, Tapu Lele is devoid of guilt about its cruel disposition and can be described as nature incarnate.
pokecraft.species.tapubulu.name: Tapu Bulu
pokecraft.species.tapubulu.desc: It makes ringing sounds with its tail to let others know where it is, avoiding unneeded conflicts. This guardian deity of Ula’ula controls plants.
pokecraft.species.tapufini.name: Tapu Fini
pokecraft.species.tapufini.desc: Although it’s called a guardian deity, terrible calamities sometimes befall those who recklessly approach Tapu Fini.
pokecraft.species.cosmog.name: Cosmog
pokecraft.species.cosmog.desc: Cosmog is very curious but not very cautious, often placing itself in danger. If things start to look dicey, it teleports away.
pokecraft.species.cosmoem.name: Cosmoem
pokecraft.species.cosmoem.desc: It sucks in dust from the air at an astounding rate, frantically building up energy within its core as preparation for evolution.
pokecraft.species.solgaleo.name: Solgaleo
pokecraft.species.solgaleo.desc: Solgaleo was once known as the Beast That Devours the Sun. Energy in the form of light radiates boundlessly from it.
pokecraft.species.lunala.name: Lunala
pokecraft.species.lunala.desc: It steals the light from its surroundings and then becomes the full moon, showering its own light across the night sky.
pokecraft.species.nihilego.name: Nihilego
pokecraft.species.nihilego.desc: It appeared in this world from an Ultra Wormhole. Nihilego appears to be a parasite that lives by feeding on people and Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.buzzwole.name: Buzzwole
pokecraft.species.buzzwole.desc: Buzzwole goes around showing off its abnormally swollen muscles. It is one kind of Ultra Beast.
pokecraft.species.pheromosa.name: Pheromosa
pokecraft.species.pheromosa.desc: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
pokecraft.species.xurkitree.name: Xurkitree
pokecraft.species.xurkitree.desc: They’ve been dubbed Ultra Beasts. Some of them stand unmoving, like trees, with their arms and legs stuck into the ground.
pokecraft.species.celesteela.name: Celesteela
pokecraft.species.celesteela.desc: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
pokecraft.species.kartana.name: Kartana
pokecraft.species.kartana.desc: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
pokecraft.species.guzzlord.name: Guzzlord
pokecraft.species.guzzlord.desc: An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be constantly hungry—it is certainly always devouring something.
pokecraft.species.necrozma.name: Necrozma
pokecraft.species.necrozma.desc: It needs light to survive, and it goes on a rampage seeking it out. Its laser beams will cut anything to pieces.
pokecraft.species.magearna.name: Magearna
pokecraft.species.magearna.desc: Built roughly 500 years ago by a scientist, the part called the Soul-Heart is the actual life-form.
pokecraft.species.marshadow.name: Marshadow
pokecraft.species.marshadow.desc: This Pokémon can conceal itself in any shadow, so it went undiscovered for a long time.
pokecraft.species.poipole.name: Poipole
pokecraft.species.poipole.desc: An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with poison from the needles on its head.
pokecraft.species.naganadel.name: Naganadel
pokecraft.species.naganadel.desc: One kind of Ultra Beast, it fires a glowing, venomous liquid from its needles. This liquid is also immensely adhesive.
pokecraft.species.stakataka.name: Stakataka
pokecraft.species.stakataka.desc: When stone walls started moving and attacking, the brute’s true identity was this mysterious life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.
pokecraft.species.blacephalon.name: Blacephalon
pokecraft.species.blacephalon.desc: A UB that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it causes explosions, then takes advantage of opponents’ surprise to rob them of their vitality.
pokecraft.species.zeraora.name: Zeraora
pokecraft.species.zeraora.desc: Electricity sparks from the pads on its limbs. Wherever Zeraora runs, lightning flashes and thunder echoes.
pokecraft.species.meltan.name: Meltan
pokecraft.species.meltan.desc: They live as a group, but when the time comes, one strong Meltan will absorb all the others and evolve.
pokecraft.species.melmetal.name: Melmetal
pokecraft.species.melmetal.desc: Centrifugal force is behind the punches of Melmetal’s heavy hex-nut arms. Melmetal is said to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.grookey.name: Grookey
pokecraft.species.grookey.desc: It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.
pokecraft.species.thwackey.name: Thwackey
pokecraft.species.thwackey.desc: When it’s drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won’t even notice that it’s already knocked out its opponent.
pokecraft.species.rillaboom.name: Rillaboom
pokecraft.species.rillaboom.desc: The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.
pokecraft.species.scorbunny.name: Scorbunny
pokecraft.species.scorbunny.desc: It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and one on its nose. Once it’s raring to fight, these pads radiate tremendous heat.
pokecraft.species.raboot.name: Raboot
pokecraft.species.raboot.desc: It kicks berries right off the branches of trees and then juggles them with its feet, practicing its footwork.
pokecraft.species.cinderace.name: Cinderace
pokecraft.species.cinderace.desc: It’s skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.
pokecraft.species.sobble.name: Sobble
pokecraft.species.sobble.desc: When it gets wet, its skin changes color, and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if it were camouflaged.
pokecraft.species.drizzile.name: Drizzile
pokecraft.species.drizzile.desc: Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.
pokecraft.species.inteleon.name: Inteleon
pokecraft.species.inteleon.desc: Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes’ weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.
pokecraft.species.skwovet.name: Skwovet
pokecraft.species.skwovet.desc: It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It’ll show up on farms, searching for yet more berries.
pokecraft.species.greedent.name: Greedent
pokecraft.species.greedent.desc: Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.
pokecraft.species.rookidee.name: Rookidee
pokecraft.species.rookidee.desc: Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest opportunity to disorient larger opponents.
pokecraft.species.corvisquire.name: Corvisquire
pokecraft.species.corvisquire.desc: The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent’s strength.
pokecraft.species.corviknight.name: Corviknight
pokecraft.species.corviknight.desc: With their great intellect and flying skills, these Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar region’s airborne taxi service.
pokecraft.species.blipbug.name: Blipbug
pokecraft.species.blipbug.desc: Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.
pokecraft.species.dottler.name: Dottler
pokecraft.species.dottler.desc: As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.
pokecraft.species.orbeetle.name: Orbeetle
pokecraft.species.orbeetle.desc: It emits psychic energy to observe and study what’s around it—and what’s around it can include things over six miles away.
pokecraft.species.nickit.name: Nickit
pokecraft.species.nickit.desc: Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.
pokecraft.species.thievul.name: Thievul
pokecraft.species.thievul.desc: With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes around stealing food and eggs. Boltund is its natural enemy.
pokecraft.species.gossifleur.name: Gossifleur
pokecraft.species.gossifleur.desc: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.eldegoss.name: Eldegoss
pokecraft.species.eldegoss.desc: The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar regional specialty.
pokecraft.species.wooloo.name: Wooloo
pokecraft.species.wooloo.desc: If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won’t be able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this Pokémon is surprisingly strong.
pokecraft.species.dubwool.name: Dubwool
pokecraft.species.dubwool.desc: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.
pokecraft.species.chewtle.name: Chewtle
pokecraft.species.chewtle.desc: It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this Pokémon bites down and never lets go.
pokecraft.species.drednaw.name: Drednaw
pokecraft.species.drednaw.desc: This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.
pokecraft.species.yamper.name: Yamper
pokecraft.species.yamper.desc: This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with their work because it wants treats. As it runs, it crackles with electricity.
pokecraft.species.boltund.name: Boltund
pokecraft.species.boltund.desc: It sends electricity through its legs to boost their strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks 50 mph.
pokecraft.species.rolycoly.name: Rolycoly
pokecraft.species.rolycoly.desc: It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough, rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.
pokecraft.species.carkol.name: Carkol
pokecraft.species.carkol.desc: By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over 18 mph. The temperature of the flames it breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokecraft.species.coalossal.name: Coalossal
pokecraft.species.coalossal.desc: While it’s engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.
pokecraft.species.applin.name: Applin
pokecraft.species.applin.desc: As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.
pokecraft.species.flapple.name: Flapple
pokecraft.species.flapple.desc: It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid. It can also change its shape into that of an apple.
pokecraft.species.appletun.name: Appletun
pokecraft.species.appletun.desc: Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the skin on its back is especially yummy. Children used to have it as a snack.
pokecraft.species.silicobra.name: Silicobra
pokecraft.species.silicobra.desc: It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.
pokecraft.species.sandaconda.name: Sandaconda
pokecraft.species.sandaconda.desc: Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.
pokecraft.species.cramorant.name: Cramorant
pokecraft.species.cramorant.desc: This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole. Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.
pokecraft.species.arrokuda.name: Arrokuda
pokecraft.species.arrokuda.desc: After it’s eaten its fill, its movements become extremely sluggish. That’s when Cramorant swallows it up.
pokecraft.species.barraskewda.name: Barraskewda
pokecraft.species.barraskewda.desc: It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging forward at speeds of over 100 knots before ramming prey and spearing into them.
pokecraft.species.toxel.name: Toxel
pokecraft.species.toxel.desc: It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it can cause a tingling paralysis.
pokecraft.species.toxtricity.name: Toxtricity
pokecraft.species.toxtricity.desc: This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it might contain.
pokecraft.species.sizzlipede.name: Sizzlipede
pokecraft.species.sizzlipede.desc: It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking them in its coils. Once they’re well-done, it will voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.
pokecraft.species.centiskorch.name: Centiskorch
pokecraft.species.centiskorch.desc: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.
pokecraft.species.clobbopus.name: Clobbopus
pokecraft.species.clobbopus.desc: Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn’t alarmed when that happens—it knows they’ll grow back. It’s about as smart as a three-year-old.
pokecraft.species.grapploct.name: Grapploct
pokecraft.species.grapploct.desc: Searching for an opponent to test its skills against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle is over, it returns to the sea.
pokecraft.species.sinistea.name: Sinistea
pokecraft.species.sinistea.desc: The teacup in which this Pokémon makes its home is a famous piece of antique tableware. Many forgeries are in circulation.
pokecraft.species.polteageist.name: Polteageist
pokecraft.species.polteageist.desc: Leaving leftover black tea unattended is asking for this Pokémon to come along and pour itself into it, turning the tea into a new Polteageist.
pokecraft.species.hatenna.name: Hatenna
pokecraft.species.hatenna.desc: If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas without people.
pokecraft.species.hattrem.name: Hattrem
pokecraft.species.hattrem.desc: Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to get them to quiet down. One blow from those braids would knock out a professional boxer.
pokecraft.species.hatterene.name: Hatterene
pokecraft.species.hatterene.desc: If you’re too loud around it, you risk being torn apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon is also known as the Forest Witch.
pokecraft.species.impidimp.name: Impidimp
pokecraft.species.impidimp.desc: It sneaks into people’s homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.
pokecraft.species.morgrem.name: Morgrem
pokecraft.species.morgrem.desc: With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the woods. Some believe it to have the power to make crops grow.
pokecraft.species.grimmsnarl.name: Grimmsnarl
pokecraft.species.grimmsnarl.desc: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.
pokecraft.species.obstagoon.name: Obstagoon
pokecraft.species.obstagoon.desc: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.
pokecraft.species.perrserker.name: Perrserker
pokecraft.species.perrserker.desc: After many battles, it evolved dangerous claws that come together to form daggers when extended.
pokecraft.species.cursola.name: Cursola
pokecraft.species.cursola.desc: Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You’ll become stiff as stone if you touch it.
pokecraft.species.sirfetchd.name: Sirfetch’d
pokecraft.species.sirfetchd.desc: After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.
pokecraft.species.mrrime.name: Mr. Rime
pokecraft.species.mrrime.desc: Its amusing movements make it very popular. It releases its psychic power from the pattern on its belly.
pokecraft.species.runerigus.name: Runerigus
pokecraft.species.runerigus.desc: Never touch its shadowlike body, or you’ll be shown the horrific memories behind the picture carved into it.
pokecraft.species.milcery.name: Milcery
pokecraft.species.milcery.desc: They say that any patisserie visited by Milcery is guaranteed success and good fortune.
pokecraft.species.alcremie.name: Alcremie
pokecraft.species.alcremie.desc: When Alcremie is content, the cream it secretes from its hands becomes sweeter and richer.
pokecraft.species.falinks.name: Falinks
pokecraft.species.falinks.desc: The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.
pokecraft.species.pincurchin.name: Pincurchin
pokecraft.species.pincurchin.desc: It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for at least three hours.
pokecraft.species.snom.name: Snom
pokecraft.species.snom.desc: It eats snow that piles up on the ground. The more snow it eats, the bigger and more impressive the spikes on its back grow.
pokecraft.species.frosmoth.name: Frosmoth
pokecraft.species.frosmoth.desc: It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings, causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.
pokecraft.species.stonjourner.name: Stonjourner
pokecraft.species.stonjourner.desc: Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in a circle.
pokecraft.species.eiscue.name: Eiscue
pokecraft.species.eiscue.desc: This Pokémon keeps its heat-sensitive head cool with ice. It fishes for its food, dangling its single hair into the sea to lure in prey.
pokecraft.species.indeedee.name: Indeedee
pokecraft.species.indeedee.desc: Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the source of its strength.
pokecraft.species.morpeko.name: Morpeko
pokecraft.species.morpeko.desc: It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if they’re precious treasures. No matter how much it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.
pokecraft.species.cufant.name: Cufant
pokecraft.species.cufant.desc: If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the rain, turning a vibrant green color.
pokecraft.species.copperajah.name: Copperajah
pokecraft.species.copperajah.desc: These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.
pokecraft.species.dracozolt.name: Dracozolt
pokecraft.species.dracozolt.desc: The powerful muscles in its tail generate its electricity. Compared to its lower body, its upper half is entirely too small.
pokecraft.species.arctozolt.name: Arctozolt
pokecraft.species.arctozolt.desc: This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and was able to preserve food with the ice on its body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.
pokecraft.species.dracovish.name: Dracovish
pokecraft.species.dracovish.desc: Its mighty legs are capable of running at speeds exceeding 40 mph, but this Pokémon can’t breathe unless it’s underwater.
pokecraft.species.arctovish.name: Arctovish
pokecraft.species.arctovish.desc: The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go extinct anyway.
pokecraft.species.duraludon.name: Duraludon
pokecraft.species.duraludon.desc: The special metal that composes its body is very light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility. It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.
pokecraft.species.dreepy.name: Dreepy
pokecraft.species.dreepy.desc: If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.
pokecraft.species.drakloak.name: Drakloak
pokecraft.species.drakloak.desc: Without a Dreepy to place on its head and care for, it gets so uneasy it’ll try to substitute any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.
pokecraft.species.dragapult.name: Dragapult
pokecraft.species.dragapult.desc: Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult’s horns eagerly look forward to being launched out at Mach speeds.
pokecraft.species.zacian.name: Zacian
pokecraft.species.zacian.desc: This Pokémon has slumbered for many years. Some say it’s Zamazenta’s elder sister—others say the two Pokémon are rivals.
pokecraft.species.zamazenta.name: Zamazenta
pokecraft.species.zamazenta.desc: This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of a statue. It was asleep for so long, people forgot that it ever existed.
pokecraft.species.eternatus.name: Eternatus
pokecraft.species.eternatus.desc: It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years ago. There seems to be a connection between this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.
pokecraft.species.kubfu.name: Kubfu
pokecraft.species.kubfu.desc: If Kubfu pulls the long white hair on its head, its fighting spirit heightens and power wells up from the depths of its belly.
pokecraft.species.urshifu.name: Urshifu
pokecraft.species.urshifu.desc: Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs and refining its moves.
pokecraft.species.zarude.name: Zarude
pokecraft.species.zarude.desc: Once the vines on Zarude’s body tear off, they become nutrients in the soil. This helps the plants of the forest grow.
pokecraft.species.regieleki.name: Regieleki
pokecraft.species.regieleki.desc: Its entire body is made up of a single organ that generates electrical energy. Regieleki is capable of creating all Galar’s electricity.
pokecraft.species.regidrago.name: Regidrago
pokecraft.species.regidrago.desc: Its body is composed of crystallized dragon energy. Regidrago is said to have the powers of every dragon Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.glastrier.name: Glastrier
pokecraft.species.glastrier.desc: Glastrier has tremendous physical strength, and the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times harder than diamond.
pokecraft.species.spectrier.name: Spectrier
pokecraft.species.spectrier.desc: As it dashes through the night, Spectrier absorbs the life-force of sleeping creatures. It craves silence and solitude.
pokecraft.species.calyrex.name: Calyrex
pokecraft.species.calyrex.desc: Calyrex is known in legend as a king that ruled over Galar in ancient times. It has the power to cause hearts to mend and plants to spring forth.
pokecraft.species.wyrdeer.name: Wyrdeer
pokecraft.species.wyrdeer.desc: The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.
pokecraft.species.kleavor.name: Kleavor
pokecraft.species.kleavor.desc: A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.
pokecraft.species.ursaluna.name: Ursaluna
pokecraft.species.ursaluna.desc: I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat at will.
pokecraft.species.basculegion.name: Basculegion
pokecraft.species.basculegion.desc: Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream. No other species throughout all Hisui's rivers is Basculegion's equal.
pokecraft.species.sneasler.name: Sneasler
pokecraft.species.sneasler.desc: Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.
pokecraft.species.overqwil.name: Overqwil
pokecraft.species.overqwil.desc: Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the nickname ”sea fiend.” It slurps up poison to nourish itself.
pokecraft.species.enamorus.name: Enamorus
pokecraft.species.enamorus.desc: When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter comes to an end. According to legend, this Pokémon's love gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.

pokecraft.species.floragato.name: Floragato
pokecraft.species.meowscarada.name: Meowscarada

pokecraft.species.annihilape.name: Brute Bonnet
pokecraft.species.farigiraf.name: Sandy Shocks
pokecraft.species.dudunsparce.name: Scream Tail
pokecraft.species.kingambit.name: Flutter Mane
pokecraft.species.greattusk.name: Slither Wing
pokecraft.species.screamtail.name: Roaring Moon

pokecraft.species.sandyshocks.name: Iron Hands
